mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.qyid qyid, t.gsxz gsxz, t.sfhwdlcp sfhwdlcp, t.hwdlcppp hwdlcppp, t.fmzl fmzl, t.syxxzl syxxzl, t.wgsjzl wgsjzl, t.sfgxjsqy sfgxjsqy, t.gxjsjb gxjsjb, t.zycp zycp, t.sfhyxydj sfhyxydj, t.hyxydj hyxydj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_QY_WJDC t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name gsxzmc, c4.code_name gxjsjbmc, c6.code_name hyxydjmc FROM CFPA_QY_WJDC t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'GSXZ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.gsxz = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'GXJSJB' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.gxjsjb = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'HYXYDJ' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.hyxydj = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name gsxzmc, c4.code_name gxjsjbmc, c6.code_name hyxydjmc FROM CFPA_QY_WJDC t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'GSXZ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.gsxz = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'GXJSJB' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.gxjsjb = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'HYXYDJ' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.hyxydj = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.QYID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_WJDC(uuid,qyid,gsxz,sfhwdlcp,hwdlcppp,fmzl,syxxzl,wgsjzl,sfgxjsqy,gxjsjb,zycp,sfhyxydj,hyxydj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gsxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfhwdlcp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hwdlcppp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fmzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{syxxzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{wgsjzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sfgxjsqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gxjsjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zycp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfhyxydj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hyxydj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_QY_WJDC t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_WJDC(uuid,qyid,gsxz,sfhwdlcp,hwdlcppp,fmzl,syxxzl,wgsjzl,sfgxjsqy,gxjsjb,zycp,sfhyxydj,hyxydj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyid,#{item.gsxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gsxz,#{item.sfhwdlcp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfhwdlcp,#{item.hwdlcppp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} hwdlcppp,#{item.fmzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} fmzl,#{item.syxxzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} syxxzl,#{item.wgsjzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} wgsjzl,#{item.sfgxjsqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfgxjsqy,#{item.gxjsjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gxjsjb,#{item.zycp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zycp,#{item.sfhyxydj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfhyxydj,#{item.hyxydj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} hyxydj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), qyid = VALUES(qyid), gsxz = VALUES(gsxz), sfhwdlcp = VALUES(sfhwdlcp), hwdlcppp = VALUES(hwdlcppp), fmzl = VALUES(fmzl), syxxzl = VALUES(syxxzl), wgsjzl = VALUES(wgsjzl), sfgxjsqy = VALUES(sfgxjsqy), gxjsjb = VALUES(gxjsjb), zycp = VALUES(zycp), sfhyxydj = VALUES(sfhyxydj), hyxydj = VALUES(hyxydj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CFPA_QY_WJDC t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
